item.title: 23 How Does A Ventless Gas Fireplace Work Gif
item.description: 23+ How Does A Ventless Gas Fireplace Work Gif. A ventless fireplace (view example on amazon) contains a regulator that produces a fine mixture of gas and air in a way that allows the gas to burn cleanly. With professional installation, they cost $2 it's important to size a ventless fireplace for the size of its room. Napoleon Whvf31 Plazmafire Ventless Gas Fireplace Woodland Direct from assets.woodlanddirect.com Ventless fireplaces are designed to burn gas more efficiently than vented versions, resulting in far fewer fumes and no flue requirement.
